title: Quokka
summary: The quokka (/ˈkwɒkə/), also known as the short-tailed scrub wallaby (Setonix brachyurus), is a small macropod about the size of a domestic cat.[4] It is the only member of the genus Setonix. Like other marsupials in the macropod family (such as kangaroos and wallabies), the quokka is herbivorous and mainly nocturnal.[5]
